content: I'm trying to model a medication course. For example in the UK vitamin K is given to newborns as either a single injection, or a series of 4 oral doses. In DSTU2, has anyone modelled a medication course (such as the 4 oral doses of vitamin K). If so, could you let me know how you've modelled the dose number (1 of 4; 2 of 4 etc.).

@Dave Barnet I know that immunization has a way to specify this using, vaccinationProtocol.doseSequence and vaccinationProtocol.seriesDoses. It hasn't come up as a requirement for medication although there are other examples in oncology as well that would could use this. Feel free to add a tracker item for Pharmacy WG.
